descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://photoload.ru/data/3d/db/4a/3ddb4a6ef4b09811e216839803ac26d5.png[/img][/center]

Hey, this is my first mod!

Its not only killing by behaded yet but i working on it, for now i prefer using mod :
[url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10906\"]The Dance of Death[/url]

AND code:

set decapitationchance to 1000

This is simple esp file.

I\'ve just started doing this mod so please be patients :)

sorry for my english :P

DESCRIPTION:
This mod is based on The Highlander movie. U can fight with other Immortals and take their powers to became stronger, and at the end will remain only one immortal - winner of the Prize.
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

INSTALL :
-drop in data folder and overwrite if asked 
-check if .esp file enabled when launching from the laucher 
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Changelog:

v 0.4
Added Immortal Race (godmode without tgm in console, working stamina and limited magicka)

v 0.3
Now when Immortal die, weather will changing to stormrain, there is small explosion and the body disappears.

Added new Immortals: 
Whiterun - Krezus
Riften - Gaiden
Connor\'s House - Kurgan

v 0.2
Ench. MacLeod\'s House

v 0.1
Kurgan The Immortal
House where Connor lives with Heather
author: psych0ll
